summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of Fifteen ($15.00) Dollars out of the water fund of the City of Seattle, to pay the claim of W. E. Dwyer for damages to his lot described as the south thirty (30) feet of Lot Three (3), Block Seven (7), East Park Addition to the City of Seattle, caused by the breaking of a water main in Bellevue Place, on the 13th day of February, 1916, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
